channel.title: Uploading not working
channel.description: When I try to upload it just says in error has occured( using both mediafire and megaupload) I have uploaded before with no problems. I think it might be that my free trail with winrar is up, but I can still run the program. Any one know what's up?

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

i uploaded something 2 hours ago, it worked

well if pure is right, then just wait a bit until the site refreshes it’s brain

item.title: Uploading not working
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:7, topic:342165”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=438577.msg3223146#msg3223146 date=1275345700]
or just send it to me via msn i will upload it to my ftp for you.
[/quote]
You can fish some seals for a bear and feed it to him, but you can’t teach a bear to fish on his own.
You can upload as many files as you like for him, but he won’t learn how to upload for his own.[/quote]actually i’ve tried to upload something a min ago to several web hosts, it didn’t work; it aint his fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading not working
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

post your process with a few pics on how you compress your folder. Obviously you did it wrong
just to clarify:

right click the folder
select send to
choose compressed
wait for load
upload that thing you just compressed

now before you avoid work and say you did that, you still should tell us your process

Read full topic
